div.head: 馬喉痹
div.div: , throat blockage [as fast as a galloping] horse

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: , throat blockage [as fast as a galloping] horse

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with ji hou bi 急喉痹 , acute throat blockage. Zhu bing yuan hou lun 諸病源候論 30: 熱毒 之氣結於喉間，腫連頰而微壯熱，煩滿而數吐氣，呼之為馬喉痹 , “When the qi of heat poison forms nodes in the throat, with swelling of the adjoining cheeks and a slight to strong fever, vexation, a feeling of fullness, and frequent spitting of qi, this is commonly called ‘ throat blockage [as fast as a galloping] horse ’”.
